careersPage.title: Careers
careersPage.subtitle: Join our team and create value together

hero.title: Build the Future of E-commerce Together
hero.subtitle: We bring together experts in cross-border e-commerce, local operations, content creation and marketing. Our office is located in the center of Ho Chi Minh City, with complete training systems and clear career advancement paths.
hero.quote: We are looking for candidates who align with our philosophy of 'Customer-Centric - Professional Service', passionate about e-commerce, with global mindset and local adaptation capabilities.
hero.author: CEO, TK Connection

who.title: Who We Are
who.content: Founded by partners from ByteDance, Alibaba, we are an officially certified TikTok Shop service provider in Vietnam (TAP/TSP). A fast-growing cross-border e-commerce service platform with a full-chain operation ecosystem.

team.title: Our Team
team.content: Gathering experts in cross-border e-commerce, local operations, content creation and marketing. Our office is located in central Ho Chi Minh City, with complete training systems and clear promotion paths.

looking.title: We're Looking For
looking.content: Candidates who align with our philosophy of 'Customer-Centric - Professional Service', passionate about e-commerce, with global mindset and local adaptation capabilities.

jobs.title: TikTok E-commerce Specialist
jobs.description: Responsible for daily operations of TikTok Shop: product listing, title optimization, pricing adjustment, order processing, after-sales service.
responsibilities: Responsible for daily TikTok Shop operations: product listing, title optimization, pricing, order processing, after-sales
Analyze shop data (traffic, conversion rate, repurchase rate...), build optimization strategies to increase sales
Coordinate with marketing campaigns and KOL/KOC collaborations, manage inventory and logistics
Monitor Vietnam e-commerce market trends and platform policy changes
requirements: 1-2 years experience in e-commerce platform operations; TikTok Shop knowledge preferred
Data analysis capabilities, ability to identify issues and propose solutions from data
Fluent in Vietnamese (native level); proficiency in Chinese or English preferred
Proactive, good communication and coordination skills, high pressure tolerance

jobs.title: Short Video Specialist
jobs.description: Responsible for ideation, shooting, editing of short videos for brand accounts, producing content suitable for Vietnamese market preferences.
responsibilities: Responsible for ideation, shooting and editing short videos for brand accounts
Build systematic short video content plans (content matrix), increase followers
Coordinate with KOL/KOC in short video campaigns
Research TikTok content trends and popular creative formats
requirements: Experience in full short video production process (ideation - shooting - editing - post-production)
Proficient in tools like CapCut, Premiere or equivalent
Understanding of TikTok trends and user behavior in Vietnam
Ability to work independently and in teams, handle deadline pressure

jobs.title: Livestream MC/Host
jobs.description: Host live selling sessions, introduce products attractively and drive conversions.
responsibilities: Host live selling sessions on TikTok Shop
Introduce products attractively, interact with audience
Follow livestream scripts and optimize sales performance
Build relationships with viewers, create loyal community
requirements: Experience in live streaming or MC work, preferably in sales
Flexible with working hours (including evenings and weekends)

jobs.title: KOL/KOC Manager
jobs.description: Develop and manage KOL/KOC network, coordinate collaboration campaigns and optimize performance.
responsibilities: Discover, evaluate and build relationships with quality KOL/KOC
Plan and execute KOL/KOC collaboration campaigns
Negotiate contracts, coordinate content and ensure output quality
Monitor, measure and report campaign performance
requirements: 2+ years experience in KOL/influencer marketing management
Existing KOL/KOC network is an advantage
Ability to analyze data and campaign ROI

jobsSection.title: Open Positions
jobsSection.subtitle: Explore exciting career opportunities and join our growing team

steps.title: Submit CV
steps.description: Send your CV (Vietnamese/Chinese/English) to recruitment email with subject: Position - Full Name - Phone Number

steps.title: Resume Screening
steps.description: Company will respond within 1-3 business days. Suitable candidates will be contacted for interview

steps.title: Interview
steps.description: Interview round 1 (online/offline) with hiring manager, followed by round 2 with leadership team

steps.title: Receive Offer
steps.description: Receive official job offer and complete onboarding procedures
